Articles.Content:
I was wondering what would happen if I used a "outdated" mod with my KSP save (1.2.2). I mean the mods I need are only 1 version lower! (1.1) Do they work? Do they summon Krakens? Do they mess up your save? I just need to know, just to be safe...

The mods in particular are Camera Tools and Texture Replacer.

Edited December 30, 2016 by Spacetraindriver

I'd be careful, but I've been using 1.2.2 & 1.2 for 1.2.1. However, I'm not so sure about 1.1 to 1.2, there were some changes to aerodynamics n such which might affect some components of your modded game. I'd test anything in a test save before using it with a save you love.
Could crash, could work just fine. It completely depends on the mod. Only way to know for sure is, AS ALWAYS !!! (read my signature), to back-up your save and try.

1 hour ago, Spacetraindriver said:

I was wondering what would happen if I used a "outdated" mod with my KSP save (1.2.2). I mean the mods I need are only 1 version lower! (1.1) Do they work? Do they summon Krakens? Do they mess up your save? I just need to know, just to be safe...

The mods in particular are Camera Tools and Texture Replacer.

Texture replacer still works fine in 1.2.1. I have it installed and have no problems at all.

But as @Tex_NL has stated, back up your save before opening it - just in case.
Don't you guys know there's a Texture Replacer for KSP 1.2.x released? It's here: https://github.com/RangeMachine/TextureReplacer/releases
